title: Carolinian and Piedmont Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Carolinian and Piedmont
bottom_text:
Additional service to Raleigh, Cary, and points north is provided by the Silver Star. Additional service to Selma-Smithfield, Wilson, and points north is provided by the Palmetto. See the Silver Service timetable for details.

Local connecting trains are provided: at New York by the MTA, at New York, Philadelphia, and all stations in New Jersey by NJ Transit, at Trenton, Philadelphia and Wilmington by SEPTA,
at Baltimore and DC by the Maryland Transit Administration, at DC and Alexandria by WMATA, and at DC, Alexandria, Quantico, and Fredericksburg by VRE.
programmers_warning: Train 80 has lots of bizarre duplicates.  Consider cleaning the GTFS data.
